entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.IFRS.0130.9725] The calculated earnings or loss per share does not equal the actual value reported for the concept DilutedEarningsLossPerShare for the period 2019-04-01 to 2020-03-31. The value reported is -32.9. The calculated value is calculated by dividing the concept ProfitLossAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntityIncludingDilutiveEffects with a value of -43,895,800,000 by the denominator AdjustedWeightedAverageShares with a value of 508,502,371. This equals -86.3237 (rounded 4d) which differs from the reported value of -32.9. Please check that the calculation is correct or that the correct elements have been used.
Element : DilutedEarningsLossPerShare Period : 2019-04-01 to 2020-03-31 Dimensions : ifrs-full:ClassesOfShareCapitalAxis=ttm:AOrdinarySharesMember Decimals : 1 Unit : INR/shares
Rule Element Id:9725 Rule version: 17.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/926042/000119312521202050/ttm-20210331.xml 21690
